patterns: How can i upload a video?
How can i upload a project ?
responses: You only can upload videos or projects after you sign in.
After you sign in, go to the blog page.

patterns: How can I see the videos?
How can I see the projects?
responses: You only can see the video or projects if you were signed in.
After you sign in, you can see the projects or videos.

patterns: Does Requirement Engineering Course has prerequisites ?
I Want To Study Requirement Engineering Next Semester
What is The Credit Hours Of Software Engineering?
In What Semester Should I Study Requirement Engineering Course ?
responses: Students Take Requirement Engineering Course in Their First Semester in The Department, Its Prerequisite is Fundamental Of Software Engineering, Both have 3 Credit Hours

patterns: How Can I Delete a Course ?
I Want To Delete a Course
responses: You Can Talk To Your Academic Advisor To Delete Courses Within a Specific Period In The Beginning Of The Semester

patterns: How To Reach My Academic Advisor ?
Who Is My Academic Advisor ?
Do I Have an Acadmic Advisor ?
How To Find Information About My Academic Advisor ?
responses:
Kindly Check Odus To Find Your Academic Advisor. 
 Note: You Can Only Have an Academic Advisor If You're Already Majored In The Department

patterns: Which Courses Will Be Studied In The Summer Semester ?
Is Free Courses Will Be Studied In The Summer Semester ?
Is Optional Courses Will Be Studied In The Summer Semester ?
responses:
We Still Don't Have Enough Information Please Check Again Soon To Be Updated About The Summer Semester 
 or Kindly Ask Your Academic Advisor For Quick Information

patterns: Does Operating System Course has prerequisites ?
I Want To Study Operating System Next Semester
What is The Credit Hours Of Operating System ?
In What Semester Should I Study Operatint System Course ?
responses: Students Take Operating System Course in Their 4th Semester in The Department, It Doesn't Have Prerequisites and It has 3 Credit Hours

patterns: How Can I Delete A Semester ?
What Would Happen If I Deleted a Semester ?
I Want To Delete This Semester
What is The Difference Between Apologising For a Semester and Delaying a Semester ?
responses:
You Can Delete the Semetser If The Period is Still Available 
 Ensure You're Okay With Being One Semester Late Of Getting Graduated
Apology a Semester:  Calculated within the academic period and the reward period
The last date for apology is two weeks before the final exams.
Delay Semester: It is not counted within the study period and the reward period. The application for it must be before the start of the study.
